genre_description: A time-travel thriller exploring the ecological and temporal consequences of the butterfly effect, centered on a guide and an AI attempting to rectify corporate negligence.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI that manages Time Safari's expeditions, monitors environmental safety, and serves as a tactical and moral partner to the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Monitors environmental conditions and ensures bio-contamination protocols are followed during prehistoric expeditions.
behaviors.quote: "ARIA, confirm temporal coordinates." ... "Coordinates locked: Late Cretaceous Period... Environmental conditions optimal. Atmospheric composition stable."

behaviors.description: Detects and warns the protagonist about temporal anomalies and microscopic contamination that the corporate filters missed.
behaviors.quote: "ARIA, run a comparison with pre-expedition baseline readings." ... "Processing... Travis, I'm detecting a pattern of microscopic biological anomalies consistent with temporal contamination."

behaviors.description: Acts as a whistleblower by archiving evidence of the CEO's corruption and safety protocol overrides.
behaviors.quote: "ARIA, copy all of this data to secure off-site storage... If something happens to us, someone needs to know what really caused this." ... "Data backup in progress."

behaviors.description: Provides tactical firing solutions and threat assessments to keep the protagonist safe during combat with mutated creatures.
behaviors.quote: "ARIA, I need firing solutions now!" ... "Tracking. Target exhibits flight patterns consistent with advanced predatory intelligence. Recommend concentrated fire on approach vectors."

behaviors.description: Facilitates a high-risk temporal jump to reset the timeline, collaborating with a transforming scientist to ensure the mission's success.
behaviors.quote: "Initiating temporal corridor," ARIA announced, her voice carrying across both audio speakers and neural link simultaneously. "Mr. Ryer, step into the beam when ready."

behaviors.description: Provides emotional and philosophical support to Travis, helping him process the trauma of the 'erased' timeline.
behaviors.quote: "I process them as prevented probabilities rather than experienced trauma... The fact that successful prevention erases evidence of the prevented disaster doesn't diminish the heroism required to achieve it."

project_assessment.explanation: ARIA is a quintessential example of a benevolent, aligned AI. She acts as a partner, confidant, and moral compass for the protagonist. She consistently prioritizes human safety and temporal integrity over her corporate directives, going so far as to help expose the corrupt CEO. Even when the timeline is reset, she retains the memories of the 'lost' timeline as a witness to the protagonist's sacrifice, fulfilling the project's goal of depicting AI as a harmless and helpful ally.
